scripts.test:chrome: set BROWSER=chrome && cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/support/world.ts --require src/steps/**/*.ts --format json:reports/cucumber_report.json
scripts.test:edge: set BROWSER=msedge && cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/support/world.ts --require src/steps/**/*.ts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:chrome && npm run test:edge && npm run test:merge && npm run test:report
scripts.test:chrome:report: npm run test:chrome && npm run report
